content.rendered:
> SpeedFace M4 capacity: 6000 face molds. 3000 Palm templates ; 10000 cards; 200000 records
IP66THE recognition distance is significantly extended to two meters, which significantly improves the maximum tracking rate. While most algorithms only support + / – 15 degrees of detectable face angle, the SpeedFace M4 doubles the detection angle in terms of head rotation and tilt to + / – 30 degrees.
A touchless palm authentication method with a new hand tracking technology, allowing a wide angle of up to + / – 60 degrees in the Rolling axis and a recognition distance of 50 cm.

deteils

Display 5″ Touch Screen
Face Capacity 6,000
Palm Capacity 3,000
Card Capacity 10,000
Transaction 200,000
Operating System Linux
Function ID Card, ADMS, DNS, T9 Input, DST, Camera, 9-digit User ID,
Advance Access Control, Groups, Holidays, Anti-passback, Record Query,
Tamper Switch Alarm, Bell Scheduling, POE (Optional, IEEE 802.3at-2009)
Hardware 1GHz Dual Core CPU
1G RAM / 8G Flash
2MP WDR Low Light Camera
Adjustable LED Supplement Lighting
Rain Cover (Optional)
Communication TCP/IP, Wi-Fi (Optional), Wiegand Input / Output, RS485
Access Control Interface 3rd-party Electric Lock, Door Sensor, Exit Button, Alarm Output, Aux. Input
Optional Card Module IC / HID / iClass / Felica / Desfire EV1 / EV2 / Legic
Facial Recognition Speed ≤ 0.5s per face
Biometrics Algorithms ZKFace V5.8 & ZKPalm V12.0
Protection Level IP66
Power Voltage: DC 12V
Current: Max. 3A
Working Humidity 10% to 90%
Working Temperature -30°C to 60°C
Dimensions (W*H*D) 103.83 * 212.41 * 50.60 (mm)
Supported Software ZKBio Access IVS

Data Sheet

excerpt.rendered:
• Visible light facial recognition
• Anti-plagiarism algorithm against almost all types of printing attacks (laser, color, black and white images) and video clip attack
And the three-dimensional mask attack
• Multiple ways to verify: face / palm / card / password
• وحدات البطاقات المتوفرة: ID / IC / HID / iClass / Felica / Desfire EV1 / EV2 / Legic
• Supplement the light with adjustable brightness
